localpath = ~/en-images



[wiki]
type = net
articleurl = http://simple.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=@TITLE@&action=raw
templateurls= http://simple.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:@TITLE@&action=raw
name = simple
url  = http://simple.wikipedia.org


[images]
type = download
url = http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/ http://wikimedia.org/wikipedia/simple/
